definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: son of Micah, a Benjamite (on ´[[מ]] as individ. name v. Gray:Prop. N. 116, 122 n. 4; cf. Ph. n. pr. [[מלך]] (v. Bloch); Sab. n. pr. [[מלכם]] CIS:iv. 1; Palm. n. pr. [[מלכו]] Vog:Pa1m. 92 al. Nab. id., Eut:Nab 21, 4 al. Vog:Nab 1, 2 );—1Ch 8:35 (LXX Melxhl), 1Ch 9:41 (LXX Malax; LXXL Melxihl in both).
